display_name: Smith Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire (SMEQ): How long a time does it usually take before you "recover your senses" in the morning after rising from a night's sleep?
description:
Item from the Smith Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire. Item 1,2,6,7,8,9,10,12,13 are reverse coded. [Smith CS et al., 1989 (PubMed ID: 2793773)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/2793773/)

[Search for all Smith Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=smeq)
